messages.message:
Welcome to GM Notes


This module allows you to put GM notes on most of the things in Foundry, including actors, lights, journals, items

GM Notes


A new release is now available. The new release contains rework for journal handling allowing per-page notes and integration with Monks Enhanced Journal. Some minor fixes for selection of text. Big thanks to @JustAnotherIdea. When you are on 10.0 of GM Notes remember to go to configuration and hit 'migrate' to migrate over existing journals.
